title: PayPal Mafia Political Network Analysis (2002-2025)
description: Map the systematic coordination of PayPal alumni across tech platforms, venture capital, government contracts, and political influence
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 4: The Bridge.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Silicon Valley networks as transmission belts for oligarchic capture. Focus on specific dates, financial transactions, personnel movements, and institutional coordination mechanisms.
research_areas: Elon Musk trajectory: Tesla/SpaceX CEO to major political force, Twitter/X takeover for information control
David Sacks evolution: PayPal COO to major GOP donor to Trump 'AI and crypto czar' appointment
Reid Hoffman representation of network's liberal wing demonstrating bipartisan PayPal alumni influence
Systematic coordination across tech platforms, venture capital, government contracts creating private power over public institutions
Network effects where each member's prominence increases value for all participants
Cross-platform influence operations and government contract coordination
